meanings.definition: In a manner that shows a dislike or distrust of other people.
meanings.sent1: She glared misanthropically at the noisy crowd.
meanings.sent2: He always behaves misanthropically towards strangers.
meanings.sent3: The grumpy old man misanthropically muttered about the noisy neighbors.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes darted misanthropically around the room, avoiding contact with others.
meanings.sent5: The character in the movie was portrayed misanthropically, always avoiding social gatherings.

meanings.definition: Showing a strong dislike or distrust of other people.
meanings.sent1: The misanthropic old lady lived alone in the woods.
meanings.sent2: His misanthropic behavior made it hard for him to make friends.
meanings.sent3: The misanthropic cat hissed at anyone who came near.
meanings.sent4: The misanthropic clouds seemed to block out all sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The misanthropic character in the story never smiled or spoke kindly to anyone.
